	1
    CTransTool TransTool;
	int i = 0;
	double dDesX[10], dDesY[10], dDesZ[10];
	double dX[10] = {2821335.355,
		2886004.956,
		2775692.14,
		2948511.313,
		2951824.635,
		2815528.447,
		2756094.445,
		2907804.872,
		2707046.301,
		2712758.269};
	double dY[10] = {625027.1208,
		731142.0929,
		503429.095,
		615525.5199,
		750926.5092,
		701732.3303,
		660798.9258,
		563355.9092,
		610950.7251,
		566582.894};
	double dZ[10] = {587.613,
		114.135,
		420.892,
		280.195,
		139.036,
		99.249,
		110.59,
		223.145,
		102.63,
		139.956};
	double dX1[10] = {2821278.379,
		2885949.178,
		2775634.127,
		2948455.832,
		2951769.739,
		2815471.702,
		2756036.823,
		2907748.684,
		2706987.899,
		2712699.76};
	double dY1[10] = {625097.8893,
		731213.8857,
		503498.5999,
		615595.6594,
		750998.2801,
		701804.0441,
		660870.3817,
		563425.5896,
		611021.7807,
		566653.4029};
	double dZ1[10] = {534.7121,
		61.6113,
		367.4465,
		226.4292,
		86.2654,
		46.9519,
		58.3849,
		169.2562,
		50.4038,
		87.3759};

	TransTool.SetTransPara(dX, dY, dZ, dX1, dY1, dZ1, 10);

	for(i = 0; i<10; i++)
	{
		TransTool.TransDot(dX[i], dY[i], dZ[i], dDesX[i], dDesY[i], dDesZ[i]);
	}
